com.example.papr_w8.BookView

Class BookBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.papr_w8.BookView.BookBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BookBasicView, BookOwnedView, BookRequestedView, BookReturningView, RequestBookView

    public abstract class BookBase
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    This is an abstract class extending Fragment to perform the displaying the Title, Author, ISBN Status, Owner and Book Cover onto the view.
